item.description:
1 SHOWING ONLY - East coast premiere of "Perception," a brand new drama by NYC transplant filmmaker Wade Wofford, who's a member of Western MA Movie Group!

Produced in a *truly* independent way over the course of five years, the film won the Royal Reel Award in Filmmaking at the Canada International Film Festival and Best Dramatic Feature at the DIY Film Fest in Hollywood.

Meet in lobby at 7:40pm.

The premiere will be followed by a Q&A with the filmmaker.

Post-film cocktail party at Packard's!

Trailer:
http://www.perceptionthefilm.com/trailer.php

Event info:
http://www.academyofmusictheatre.com/events/perception/
item.name: Movie Group Member's Feature Film on the big screen!
